subject: Re: [junit] Is it possible to write tesMethods for only the  calling class..?
msgSnippet: ... Of course. What stops you? J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that people understand.
messageBody:
>So said udaybhaskar76 on 2003-07-05 --------------------
>I've 3 class A,B and C. The class A calls B which inturn calls C. Is
>it possible to write the testMethods for only the methods of class A.

Of course. What stops you?


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
